columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: This column holds the record ID of the specimen record to which the requisition comments belong.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column holds the line number corresponding to the line of requisition comment. (A requisition comment may be split up into multiple lines depending on the length of the requisition comment).

columns.name: REQ_COMMENTS
columns.description: This column stores the free text requisition comments.
